post.body: dirty little mind
thanks! yes, our multicolr lab made MAKE http://tinyurl.com/65ggj9
watch your heart with that listening list!
design spec: simplicity, deadline is tmr. that's your spec. @rhh? and @ryantaylor? anything else?
we are compiling gvt bailout requests. send them over!
your wish is my command. tineye mobile for wine labels is next!
well you are on too! lunch coming your way soon!
you are on. dates out to you tmr
i would love your company at lunch or dinner or bourbon. you know what my schedule has been like! will ping you
will quote you on that!
thanks for your feedback by the way! much appreciated.
continue drinking the koolaid.
yes, seems like we kicked their butt in gear! but similarity searching does not equal TinEye!
it is all awful really.
yes. as an appetizer. terroni on queen west. i am never setting foot there again. i am vegetarian. shocking. cruel.
so so true about darfur
i can't believe that!
thank you for the awesome madeleines: http://tinyurl.com/6rl97h
safe travels! and enjoy :)
on the slopes!
73 people for the Montreal Tech Entrepreneur Breakfast on Tuesday, that's awesome!
evil cook
come to hohoto since you will be getting here just on time! would be awesome to see u!
hostile environments brings kindness out in humans. go outside mr. ingram. see what comes your way today :)
oh the grinch has come out! hohoto to u!
new year, new gig? enjoy the time off and start the new year with a bang!
yelp! oh yes baby!
"T-shirt that says "charity is the new greed" i think you are on to something here!
same here!
thanks for organizing design for the other 90% tour. awesome tour and conversations. great show!
listen to it again. carefully. i almost tossed it out in the garbage the first time i listened to it.
we are doing a final count for the event. will keep you posted.
would recommend it. will take time to get used to it though. almost tossed it out on first listen!
Madoff Story insane. insane. speechless
loved freaks and geeks. still have a copy. was awesome
loved dark city. one of my favs. was not very hot about primer. will revisit. thanks for the recos
@benlucier i am a huge fan of BSG. seen it all!
coke like in the stuff that comes in a bottle and is in liquid form or the other kind of coke :)
i am tempted by la vida coldfx but i don't take anything. i am giving my cold the one inch punch treatment. he is gone already!
i am not much of a rule follower :) but i think i kicked my flu out. back in the game tmr!
there is no talking in this team. it is all go go go and get it done!
BB beats the pants of iphone when it comes to keyboard and typing. iphone great for everything else. i am a 2 device girl!
i am sick as a dog as well. i so hate being sick. gonna do something about this and kick this thing. squash the bug. yeah?
@jeffrichman @goaliegirl i now have a BB bold + drum roll an iphone on my desk. i am moving from one device to 2!
it is indistinguishable from magic. a la mechanical turk!
pizza for dinner is awesome. order one for the dogs too!
2 bikes on the plate: Ninja 500R and the Super Sherpa (250). Both will need to be lowered. Will make final selection next week.
i hope you are making it to #hohoto. will see you there!
i am a kawasaki fan!
2 bikes on the plate: Ninja 500R and the Super Sherpa (250). Both will need to be lowered. Will make final selection next week.
UPS opt-in service is an awesome idea. i would pay to be notified via text of delivery proximity. and better tracking!
travelzoo
i killed my flu with bourbon. u should try it!
no cleats for running. i try to avoid ice. run on snow, deep snow or the road. i am the lunatic who plays chicken with the cars
snow is awesome for traveling. I sent a message upstairs and I hear there will me more snow. H-A-P-P-I-N-E-S-S
much more to plan but we want to be wrapped up with planning early so we can focus on execution!
All the best to you, family and your little one. :)
not a good idea to skimp on scuba gear my friend. no discount for you unless you don't want to see us back in TO! spend the $
oh no did dingo go out without me?
is silver ready for her walk? the bloojnanes want to know so that they can come by!
most def!
i can't believe they are letting you back in. we don't want you back! :)
thanks for the Multicolr Search Lab love. Started dreaming up its next incarnation. Hopefully a release in the new year. Believe.
dodgeball in the ideeplex. guess who is getting all the balls? no really!
planning for #hohoto under way. toronto tech party. coming very very soon.
TinEye is not a bad boy but sometimes he can spoil an image contest: http://snurl.com/71nyf
Retweeting @sarahcuda: the most cash-rich tech companies (hint NOT google or microsoft) http://tinyurl.com/5e93nh with @pkedrosky appearance
terroni: you are off my list of places to eat. horse meat on the menu? terroni: i have patronized you for a decade. bye bye for ever!
back at my desk after being on The Agenda (TVO). it was fun. But google image search still sucks! ha ha!
could leilaboujane's brain please show up for work today. no really.
we got sponsors for #hohoto and we want more sponsors! evening is going to be wicked!
at the office getting ready for the week ahead and catching up.
winter is here. brrr temperatures. wicked winds in toronto. love it. need masses of snow for total happiness. can we please have snow? lots?
miracle in the air: today i am going to get out of the office at 18:00 and head out to a lecture. can not be late.
it is now dark outside and i am still in the ideeplex. have still not managed to run. night running it will be
need to wrap up work so that i can get a run in. at this rate it will be happening in the evening. brrr!
hit 'em up 2pac. music in the house.
"We were some tiresome motherfuckers with all our talk about the end of news on paper" http://snurl.com/7qkms boing boing newspaper ind post
greed is good?
dear brain hunger should not stop you from working.
Retweeting @ambermacarthur: commandN.tv is one of the lucky sponsors of HoHoTO - get your tix now - http://tinyurl.com/6nm58f
dear brain, please show up for work. i know u have the flu, but we are useless here without you. cotton is not a good replacement for brain.
kayne west latest album is something else.
geek movie recos? what shall i pick up? i am a firefly fan, the wire fan.
planning blackberry funerals. my blackberry has died.
looking forward to this eve's forcast. Seriously Mr Winter can you please stay consistanly cold? a good -15C will do until March. ok? Good!
just finishe shopping for a motorcyle at the motorcycle show! 2009 is going to be a riding year. back to my bike roots!
will be heading to the camera bar on queen shortly.
looking forward to a 5 km run home at the end of day. in the snow. and i still have not located my winter running gear.
Wrapping up all things Idée in the ideeplex for 2008. Planning for 2009 almost complete. Thanks for a smashing year. Thanks TinEye fans!
well really peace and quiet. *peace* not *piece*. peace to all.
piece and quiet in the ideeplex.
watching cocaine cowboys. great documentary.
sick.sick.sick. crap. run with dingo dog took all my energy. but it was a nice 5 km. dingo is not tired. i am exhausted.
crap can't find my winter running attire. geez if anyone is hiding it, this is not going to work peeps. cough it up now. need to get outside
another day without a run. i am so sick. i give up. i am just going to sit down, have a glengoyne and be done for today. you win!
omg giant delivery truck stuck on dovercourt road. road rage in play. hope it is not my delivery!
you can not teach passion. and that's final people. final.
